meta.title: Ganesh Chaturthi 2025 | College Events
meta.description: Welcome Lord Ganesha with a grand Sthapna and puja on September 7, 2025.

about.title: About The Festival
description: Join the hostel residents and the entire college community as we welcome Lord Ganesha. The festival of Ganesh Chaturthi marks a time of new beginnings, wisdom, and prosperity.

Our celebration will begin with the 'Sthapna' (installation) of the beautifully crafted idol of Lord Ganesha, followed by a traditional puja and aarti. It's a day of devotion and seeking blessings for the academic year ahead.

highlights.title: Last Year's Sthapna
highlights.caption: A look at the devotional atmosphere of last year's puja.

articles.title: Ganesh Chaturthi on Campus
articles.excerpt: All are invited for the Murti Sthapna and Aarti.

questions.question: Is there a dress code?
questions.answer: Traditional or smart casual attire is recommended for the puja.
